pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Script to brute force an md5 hash.![md5-brute-force](https://github.com/vsevolod-mineev/md5-brute-force/blob/main/images/md5-brute-force.gif?raw=true)This script is for brute forcing your way through an md5 hash. Install the package using `pip install`, run the script, paste your hash -> done.# How to use:To install `md5-brute-force` using `pip install`:```pip install md5-brute-force```To execute the script enter:```md5-brute-force```
